divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at home, then I was on the phone with my wife and noticed a round orange sphere. I never saw it before. suddenly as I took out my binoculars to see it, it slowly vanished! then about 3 minutes later it came back but this time it was red. The sky was clear, it seemed to have a long point on the end opposite of the light. Now as I am typing this it has disappeared again!!! there are now to planes flying around the spot where it was last at!
Summary: orange then red sphere hovered/dissapeared reapeard then moved direction
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There has been one other sighting in Seabrook
There were no other sightings in Seabrook on or around September 26th 2013
